name: The Lone Guard
description:
This is the first game I ever made without a online course! All feedback appreciated

I TOTALLY FORGOT! RIGHT CLICK TO SHIELD AND STOP MOMENTUM!

Story:

A hoard of slimes is descending on a castle, and you are the only guard. You have to keep them occupied so they don't explode the magic artifact inside.

Mechanics:

Every time you shoot one slime. another one appears, but don't worry, that's good, because the older ones are way more deadly.

They do fling goop at you, but it doesn't kill you, only slow you down. Touching the body of the slime will kill you though.

You gain points with time and shooting slimes.

Lives and speed are related to each other, the more lives you have, the more speed you have!

Controls:

Control with WASD,

 Aim and shoot with your mouse.

Press E or R on the start or death screen to change whether the slime's goop slows you down or you stay at the same speed.

Theme Justification:

The slime at one distinct point become to much and grow out of control.

In a narrative sense the situation is out of control.

The projectiles slowly make you run our of control.
